title: The Fourth Horseman
description: A strange disease sweeps through Britain and the world with amazing swiftness. Abby Grant searches for her son. Jenny thrust out of her city life wanders through the country around London trying to find a way to survive.

title: Genesis
description: Greg comes home to find Britain just as desolate as Holland. Abby continues to look for her son, and finds that not all the gatherings of survivors have altruistic motives. Jenny finds it a challenge to survive on her own.

title: Greater Love
description: Jenny has complications after the birth of her baby. Ruth believes it may require surgery, but they lack the necessary supplies. Paul volunteers to go get medicine ad surgical equipment.
